data.description:
A process to auto load loan data, modify and extend it, then group by client and email. Once the project is generated the code can be enhanced, changing joins and adding more logic to the derived fields. Workflow can also be expanded as required, both in Create and in the code. //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// The following files need adjusting once built. Server (TODO comments in code file): gge-tables-dictionary.kts gge-eventhandler.kts gge-dataserver.kts Server (see pipeline.kts for code): LoanLoanDataLoadMapper.kt Transactions layout (see below for code): transactions.template.ts Transaction grids (TODO comments in x.ts file for each grid): document-template.create.form.schema.ts (see TODO inside document-template.ts) document-template.update.form.schema.ts (see TODO inside document-template.ts) loans-ready.template.ts (see TODO inside loans-ready.ts) loans-deleted.template.ts (see TODO inside loans-deleted.ts) loans-emailed.template.ts (see TODO inside loans-emailed.ts) loans.ts loans.template.ts loans-ready-by-client.ts loans-ready-by-client.template.ts //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Inside server/gge-app/src/main/genesis/cfg/gge-processes.xml Go to the line and add this inside the tag: ,global.genesis.notify.api,global.genesis.file.storage,global.genesis.file.templates,global.genesis.notify.api.service //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// In transactions.template.ts change the layout regions (inside the "rapid-layout" tags) to the below: //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Inside the data folder, open Client.csv and change the contents to: CLIENT_ID,CLIENT_NAME,CLIENT_DESCRIPTION 1,Client 1, Client Description 1 2,Client 2, Client Description 2 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Open genesis-notify.kts and add your credentials for an smtp email server //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Create a file called LoanEmailTemplate.html and put the following in it. Then load this via the "Document Management" tab in the GUI. Via the static page add a new item to the "Document Template" section, choosing Report1 and the uploaded template Finally, add a Client email Example

Attention!

Please find below example email


Trade Details


Id Client Deposit Amount Deposit Ccy Deposit Date Deposit Rate Maturity Amount Maturity Date Comment

Add these imports to the top of the file:
import global.genesis.gen.dao.enums.gge.client_email.EmailType
import global.genesis.gen.dao.enums.gge.document_template.ReportNumber
import global.genesis.file.templates.DocumentContentConfiguration
import global.genesis.file.templates.DocumentGenerator
import global.genesis.notify.api.notifications.EmailNotification
import global.genesis.notify.api.notifications.EmailRecipient
import global.genesis.notify.api.notifications.EmailRecipientType
import global.genesis.notify.api.service.NotificationService

TODO: Add these two line just above the eventHandler line:
    val documentGenerator = inject<DocumentGenerator>()
    val notifyService = inject<NotificationService>()

TODO: Add this above "onCommit":
    permissioning {
      permissionCodes = listOf("LoanUpdate")
    }

TODO: Add this after "onCommit":
      val details = event.details
      val trades = entityDb.getRange(Loan.byClientIdStatus(details.clientId, Status.Ready))
      val tradeMap : Map<String, Any> = mapOf(
        "trades" to trades.toList()
      )

      val docInfo = entityDb.get(DocumentTemplate.ByReportNumber(ReportNumber.Report1))
      if (docInfo == null) {
        LOG.info("Error! No document info static!")
        ack()
      }

      val documentResult =
        documentGenerator.generateContent(
          DocumentContentConfiguration(
            templateId = docInfo!!.fileStorageId,
            userName = "Genesis System",
            data = tradeMap,
            deleteOnExit = false,
            workingDirectory = "Temp")
        )

      val emails = entityDb.getRange(ClientEmail.byClientId(details.clientId))
      var emailList = listOf<EmailRecipient>()
      emails.collect {
        emailList = emailList.plus(EmailRecipient(it.emailAddress, getEmailRecipientTypeFromEmailType(it.emailType)))
      }

      val notification = EmailNotification(
        messageBody = documentResult.rawContent,
        messageHeader = docInfo.messageHeader,
        recipients = emailList
      )
      notifyService.sendNotification(notification)

      trades.collect {
        it.status = Status.Emailed
        entityDb.modify(it)
      }

TODO: Add this at the very end of the file, outside of the event handler:
fun getEmailRecipientTypeFromEmailType(recipientType: EmailType): EmailRecipientType =
  when (recipientType) {
    EmailType.To -> EmailRecipientType.TO
    EmailType.Cc -> EmailRecipientType.CC
    EmailType.Bcc -> EmailRecipientType.BCC
  }
